item.title: 马克斯-雷德：互联网是如何被垃圾充斥的
item.description:
了解这个人工智能的泔水世界

。【原文：

Understanding this world of AI slop

】

item.title: 罗技首席执行官为 "元宇宙 "上潜水课
item.description:
Hanneke Faber 谈她从潜水中学到的东西以及为什么意见分歧是好事。【原文：

Hanneke Faber on what she learned from diving and why disagreements are good.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：互联网是如何被垃圾充斥的（播客）
item.description: 曾几何时，Twitter 是发布突发新闻的好帮手。Instagram 和 Facebook 等社交媒体是与朋友保持联系的好帮手。过去，人们会整天刷新一些网站，从他们熟悉和信任的来源阅读新闻或八卦。而现在，这些都已不复存在，或者至少发生了巨大变化。利益驱动、政治动机和人工智能的结合颠覆了旧互联网的大部分内容。那么，到底发生了什么？为什么网络【原文：There was a a point in time when Twitter used to be good for breaking news. Social media outlets like Instagram and Facebook were great for keeping up with friends. There used to be websites that people would refresh throughout the day, reading news or gossip from sources they knew and trusted. Now, most of that has gone — or at least changed dramatically. A combination of profit imperatives, political motivations, and AI have upended much of that old internet. So what happened? Why has the web】

item.title: 贷款增加、准备金减少，SBI 盈利超出预期
item.description: 印度国家银行第二季度利润超出分析师预期，主要得益于强劲的信贷增长和较低的贷款损失拨备。【原文：State Bank of India’s second-quarter profit beat analyst estimates, helped by strong credit growth and lower provisioning for loan losses.】

item.title: 债务计划不尽如人意，中国股市期货和人民币汇率下滑
item.description: 在中国政府宣布了一项6万亿元（8,390亿美元）的地方政府债务再融资计划后，中国股市和人民币均出现下跌，这表明投资者对支持经济的最新尝试并不看好。【原文：Chinese stocks and the yuan declined after authorities announced a 6 trillion yuan ($839 billion) program to refinance local government debt, signaling investors weren’t impressed with the latest attempt to support the economy.】

item.title: Amundi 首席投资官认为美国债券收益率接近股票的 "警戒线
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司 Amundi SA 首席投资官表示，美国的收益率离吸引投资者从股票转向债券的水平并不遥远。【原文：US yields aren’t far from levels that would lure investors from stocks into bonds, according to the chief investment officer of Amundi SA, Europe’s biggest asset manager.】

item.title: 中国推出 1.4 万亿美元债务置换计划帮助地方政府
item.description: 中国宣布了一项 10 万亿元人民币（合 1.4 万亿美元）的地方政府债务再融资计划，中国政府正在推出更多措施来支持面临唐纳德-特朗普连任带来的新风险的经济放缓。【原文：China announced a 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) program to refinance local government debt, as Beijing rolls out more measures to support a slowing economy facing new risks from the reelection of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 土耳其上调通胀预测，缩小与市场的差距
item.description: 在物价涨幅连续两个月超过预期后，土耳其央行上调了今明两年的通胀预期，使其更接近市场预期。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised its inflation forecasts for this year and next, bringing them closer to market expectations after price gains exceeded estimates for two consecutive months.】

item.title: 英国航空公司所有者超出预期，缩减 2024 年运力目标
item.description: 由于对跨大西洋航线的需求增加，IAG SA 公布的第三季度盈利超出预期，并表示预计今年下半年将继续保持强劲的财务表现。【原文：IAG SA posted third-quarter earnings that beat estimates on higher demand for trans-Atlantic routes, and said it expects the strong financial performance to continue for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 食品配送平台 Swiggy 首次公开募股最后一天售罄
item.description: 印度食品配送平台 Swiggy Ltd. 13 亿美元的首次公开募股在最后一天的竞价中全部售出，不过由于大型投资者的早期需求疲软，销售速度有所放缓。【原文：Indian food-delivery platform Swiggy Ltd.’s $1.3 billion initial public offering was fully sold on the final day of bidding, though at a slower pace due to weak early demand from large investors.】

item.title: 印度在分析师投诉后提前发布 GDP
item.description: 印度政府将国内生产总值和通货膨胀的发布时间提前到了当天早些时候，因为分析师们说他们没有足够的时间来分析这些数据。【原文：India’s government moved the release times for gross domestic product and inflation to earlier in the day after analysts said they didn’t have enough time to analyze the figures.】

item.title: 三星领先优势扩大，Kioxia 申请推迟已久的 IPO
item.description: Kioxia Holdings Corp.计划于今年 12 月至明年 6 月在东京证券交易所上市，以缩小与内存领导者三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp. plans to debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange between this December and June next year in a bid to narrow the yawning gap with memory leader Samsung Electronics Co.】

item.title: 贝莱德基金推动美国比特币 ETF 日流入量创历史新高
item.description: 投资于比特币的美国交易所交易基金创下了日净流入 13.8 亿美元的纪录，这得益于当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对数字资产行业的支持和支持性法规的承诺。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing in Bitcoin posted a record daily net inflow of $1.38 billion, bolstered by President-elect Donald Trump’s embrace of the digital-asset industry and promise of supportive regulations.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑失守，英国股市将小幅反弹
中国财政部将于下午 4 时就债务转换计划进行简报
item.description: 中国将于周五下午 4 点在北京举行吹风会，介绍允许地方政府为其资产负债表外债务再融资的计划，预计中国官员将为经济提供更多财政支持。【原文：China will hold a briefing on a plan to allow local governments to refinance their off-balance-sheet debt at 4 p.m. on Friday in Beijing, where officials are expected to introduce more fiscal support for the economy.】

item.title: 索尼再次上调销售展望，音乐和游戏助力销售增长
item.description: 索尼集团公司（Sony Group Corp）在音乐销售强劲、PlayStation 游戏势头不减的情况下，上调了收入预期。【原文：Sony Group Corp. nudged up its revenue outlook after logging strong music sales and continued momentum for PlayStation games.】

item.title: 中国奢侈品钟表需求疲软，历峰集团利润下滑
item.description: 瑞士奢侈品集团历峰集团（Richemont）上半年利润下滑，原因是该集团的制表部门受到中国需求降温的影响。【原文：Richemont reported a slump in profit in the first half as the Swiss luxury group’s watchmaking division suffered from cooling demand in China.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片需求放缓，台积电 10 月份销售额增长放缓
item.description: 台湾半导体制造股份有限公司 10 月份的销售额增长了 29.2%，是自 2 月份以来增长速度最慢的一次，这对人工智能芯片需求的持久力提出了警示。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s sales rose 29.2% in October, the slowest pace of growth since February in a cautionary note about AI chip demand’s staying power.】

item.title: 特朗普的回归对美联储来说是一场可恶的埋伏
item.description:
从高利率的高山上走下来总是最危险的部分。对于杰罗姆-鲍威尔来说，现在看起来更加困难。【原文：

Coming down the mountain of high interest rates was always the most dangerous part. For Jerome Powell, it now looks even harder.

】

item.title: 投资者回调 "特朗普交易"，因为政策疑虑不断渗入
item.description: 在经历了最初对 "特朗普交易 "的疯狂追捧后，一些资产类别的投资者正在降低他们的热情，因为他们怀疑唐纳德-特朗普作为总统是否能够推行其雄心勃勃的关税提案。【原文：After an initial stampede into ‘Trump Trades,’ investors in some asset classes are tapering their enthusiasm as they question whether Donald Trump as a president will be able to push through his ambitious tariff proposals.】

item.title: 为什么说特朗普的胜利是马斯克的 "科技兄弟政变"？
item.description:
在本期《Merryn Talks Money》节目中，我们将讨论共和党人的第二任期对美国、英国和特斯拉首席执行官意味着什么。【原文：

On this episode of Merryn Talks Money, we discuss what the Republican’s second term means for the US, the UK and the Tesla CEO.

】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将在大选前延长利率暂停期：决策指南
item.description: 罗马尼亚央行可能会延长利率暂停期，因为决策者们要权衡与下个月举行的一系列选举相关的财政风险。【原文：Romania’s central bank will likely extend an interest-rate pause as policymakers weigh fiscal risks tied to a string of elections to be held over the next month.】

item.title: 吉利寻求超过 20 亿欧元贷款为沃尔沃卡车交易再融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国亿万富翁李书福的浙江吉利控股集团有限公司（Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co.【原文：Chinese billionaire Li Shufu’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co. is in talks with banks for a syndicated loan to refinance borrowings related to its acquisition of a stake in Volvo AB in 2018, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 与马斯克交恶后，巴西向中国 "星链 "竞争制造商示好
item.description: 巴西刚刚因社交媒体平台 X 与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）结怨，现在又在寻求一家中国公司与这位美国亿万富翁的 Starlink 互联网服务竞争。【原文：Fresh off a bitter feud with Elon Musk over his social media platform X, Brazil is now courting a Chinese company to compete with the US billionaire’s Starlink internet service.】

item.title: 气候波动可能会破坏您的一杯咖啡
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 云顶新加坡因盈利不佳股价跌至两年新低
item.description: 云顶新加坡有限公司（Genting Singapore Ltd.）第三季度业绩不佳，被分析师下调了股票评级，股价跌至两年来的最低点。【原文：Genting Singapore Ltd.’s shares fell to a two-year low after analysts downgraded the stock following lackluster third-quarter results from the firm.】

item.title: 印度将 12 亿美元绿色债务转入指数跟踪菜单
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：India made 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion) of green bonds potentially eligible for inclusion in JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s flagship emerging market debt index, just months after having stoked controversy by removing some planned tenors.】

item.title: Meta 称应用程序商店应管理澳大利亚 16 岁以下儿童社交禁令
item.description: 尽管 Meta Platforms Inc. 呼吁澳大利亚考虑将监管社交媒体使用情况的责任移交给谷歌和苹果等应用商店运营商，但澳大利亚仍将继续推进禁止 16 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体的禁令。【原文：Australia will push ahead with a ban on social media for people aged under 16 despite calls by Meta Platforms Inc. for it to consider shifting responsibility for policing usage to app store operators such as Google and Apple.】

item.title: 全球航运真的能实现绿色发展吗？
item.description:
在彭博社原创系列Momentum的这一集中，我们将揭示一些引人注目的创新，这些创新可能会使碳排放严重的行业变得更加清洁。【原文：

On this episode of the Bloomberg Originals series Momentum, we uncover striking innovations that may make a carbon-heavy industry cleaner.

】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的离岸卢比债券市场将迎来创纪录的供应年
item.description: 印度离岸卢比债券市场今年卷土重来，世界银行和亚洲开发银行等发行人的交易将年度交易量推向了历史新高。【原文：India’s offshore rupee bond market has made a big comeback this year, with deals from issuers such as the World Bank and the Asian Development Bank pushing annual volumes to an all-time high.】
